description: This image captures a lone duck standing on a frozen body of water, possibly a lake or pond. The duck, likely a female mallard, is highlighted against the shimmering icy surface, which reflects subtle hues of blue and orange, possibly from the sky or nearby surroundings. The scene conveys a sense of calm and solitude, emphasizing the duck's presence in a serene, yet stark winter landscape.
poem:
A duck on ice, so calm and neat,
Upon her icy stage so fleet,
No other birds to meet or greet,
In winter's chill, her retreat,
A serene scene, quite complete.
